content: the more the merrier this beginner-friendly blanket has enough room for everyone to snuggle a great way to use up your stash of self-striping dk weight yarn like mandala choose several different colors that make you happy or use all one color the simple pattern is all double_crochet us terms in between the stitches so easy this is a great pattern for crocheting in dark rooms while watching television or children on road trips or for crocheters with limited sight or mobility photo tutorial included in the pattern video tutorial for the stitch double_crochet between the stitches https //youtube com/watch v=mt6xjggwqkq&si=ensikaiecmiomare the pattern also includes instructions for making a smaller blanket using 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 or 8 cakes or a larger blanket using 10 11 or 12 cakes of mandala yarn please share photos of your works in progress and finished blankets here on ravelry or on pretty peaceful s facebook page please feel free to sell finished items made from this pattern as long as you include the more the merrier pattern by susan kennedy of prettypeaceful in your description when listing an item for sale online or on facebook or other social media thank you for not sharing the pattern without attributing susan kennedy as author or using any of the photos or instructions in this pattern as your own
